description: No one has ever escaped and lived to tell. At least that's the official story...Escape Alcatraz, the follow-up to Escape the Titanic delivers the next blockbuster adventure puzzler that puts you at the heart of an amazing true-life escape that remains unsolved to this day. Craft and assemble tools you’ll need, as you plan your high-stakes prison break. Can you devise an escape plan, fool the guards and find the right time to pull the trigger to freedom?Never a dull moment as you pinch, twist, tap & swipe your way through ingenious room-puzzle challenges.With nothing to lose, do you have the smarts and tenacity to solve every puzzle and make it off The Rock!  ....Good luck!  • 50+ clever puzzles - unlike anything you’ve ever seen.• Integrated Hint System, if you need a little help.• Find hidden tools to aid in your escape.•  Hints and Answers available as IAPEscape Alcatraz is a FREE-TO-TRY app. You can play the first chapter for free, if you want to unlock the epic FULL version, there is a one-time fee to purchase, plus a FREE option unlock the FULL version, too.

comments: Most puzzles are self explanatory. The odd few appeared to be impossible without some instruction. Few levels I had to skip probably around 7 levels. Couple due to pieces not moving or stuck. Very happy to be able to skip levels.  Would have been great to have a certain bank of hints for some of the  difficult ones. I found the later levels easier than the ones around 100. Max levels 120. Great fun!

Some things are hidden in such a place makes it hard on note 8 due to curved screen. Level 89 doesn't work, as well as other levels where touching the same place over and over and over might get something to work.  Most puzzles are extremely easy,  it's just a matter of the game not working.

Maybe it's just my phone, Galaxy S7, but even when i knew what to do i had to tap over and over again to get a response. Seriously, tap the object 10 times and nothing happens then tap it an eleventh time and it reacts. Very frustrating. Spent most of my time just repeatedly tapping the object. Game is a good concept, but really bad controls.
Fun and challenging for awhile, but I found most of the levels after 50 impossible to figure out without a cheat sheet. Got frustrating. I'm at level 60 and about ready to throw in the towel.
I'm stuck! I must be around level#50 to 70 and the loading process is froze up.  Can't even get to the main menu, two days now. I've liked Challenge 1&2, but, HELP!

Some levels are straight forward. Others you just have to skip because there's no logic or something is missing. Could be good with some type of help if you get stuck rather than just skipping an entire level.

description: ✔ “A brilliant multiplayer FPS that you should just go and play right now. 9/10” — PocketGamer✔ “It’s so simple that your cat can learn the controls, but the skill-cap is high enough to make even hardened FPS veterans break a sweat.” — Android and Me✔ “Guns of Boom has gone where no game has gone before – it’s a legitimately great shooter on mobile.” — Droid Gamers✔ “You’ve never seen an FPS for mobile quite as good as this. You will come back because the game experience is just topnotch.” — AndroidCommunity✔ “Guns of Boom is some solid, streamlined shooting that feels better than quite a few other mobile shooters.” — 148Apps• Easy and intuitive controls: pump your opponents full of lead from the get-go!• Awesome graphics for immersive gameplay: stylish levels and cool animation will keep you glued to the screen!• Autofire: all you need to do is get the enemy into your crosshairs.• Dynamic battles: play on a team and rip your enemies to shreds! The more active you are in battle, the better your reward will be! • Various guns: 48 weapons to choose from, including machine guns, assault and sniper rifles, shotguns, and more. Each has its own unique ability: increased headshot damage, slowing down enemies, and even health leeching. Find a gun that fits your style of play!• Explosive fun: free mobile shoot-outs that will leave your heart pounding! Gear up, soldiers!Soldier! You are one step away from action-packed combat! Can you keep steady aim under heavy fire and gun down enemies while grenades are exploding all around you? Can you handle that kind of fun?! Welcome to the game then! This ain’t no regular army, though. No one will tell you what to do or where to shoot. You have to make your own decisions and choose your own battles. Team up with other soldiers, get good at killing opponents and dominate the battlefield. Make a blitz attack, spraying lead in all directions, or try and shoot your opponent from a safe distance, taking your time to aim directly for the head. It's always your call.  Now, these wars won’t fight themselves! Get to the armory, gear up, and start making a BOOM! On the double!Guns of Boom is a hardcore multiplayer shooter with eye-popping 3D graphics and blood-boiling gameplay. It’s so simple that your cat can learn the controls, but the skill-cap is high enough to make even hardened FPS veterans break a sweat. Engage in online PvP battles on a variety of maps, utilizing different deadly guns, as well as frag grenades and med kits. Experience the ultimate competitive tension without leaving your couch!
descriptionHTML:
✔ “A brilliant multiplayer FPS that you should just go and play right now. 9/10” — PocketGamer
✔ “It’s so simple that your cat can learn the controls, but the skill-cap is high enough to make even hardened FPS veterans break a sweat.” — Android and Me
✔ “Guns of Boom has gone where no game has gone before – it’s a legitimately great shooter on mobile.” — Droid Gamers
✔ “You’ve never seen an FPS for mobile quite as good as this. You will come back because the game experience is just topnotch.” — AndroidCommunity
✔ “Guns of Boom is some solid, streamlined shooting that feels better than quite a few other mobile shooters.” — 148Apps

• Easy and intuitive controls: pump your opponents full of lead from the get-go!
• Awesome graphics for immersive gameplay: stylish levels and cool animation will keep you glued to the screen!
• Autofire: all you need to do is get the enemy into your crosshairs.
• Dynamic battles: play on a team and rip your enemies to shreds! The more active you are in battle, the better your reward will be!
• Various guns: 48 weapons to choose from, including machine guns, assault and sniper rifles, shotguns, and more. Each has its own unique ability: increased headshot damage, slowing down enemies, and even health leeching. Find a gun that fits your style of play!
• Explosive fun: free mobile shoot-outs that will leave your heart pounding! Gear up, soldiers!


Soldier!
You are one step away from action-packed combat! Can you keep steady aim under heavy fire and gun down enemies while grenades are exploding all around you? Can you handle that kind of fun?! Welcome to the game then!

This ain’t no regular army, though. No one will tell you what to do or where to shoot. You have to make your own decisions and choose your own battles. Team up with other soldiers, get good at killing opponents and dominate the battlefield. Make a blitz attack, spraying lead in all directions, or try and shoot your opponent from a safe distance, taking your time to aim directly for the head. It's always your call.  Now, these wars won’t fight themselves! Get to the armory, gear up, and start making a BOOM! On the double!
Guns of Boom is a hardcore multiplayer shooter with eye-popping 3D graphics and blood-boiling gameplay. It’s so simple that your cat can learn the controls, but the skill-cap is high enough to make even hardened FPS veterans break a sweat. Engage in online PvP battles on a variety of maps, utilizing different deadly guns, as well as frag grenades and med kits. Experience the ultimate competitive tension without leaving your couch!
developerAddress: Antakalnio st. 17, LT-10312, Vilnius, Lithuania
recentChanges: Try the new 60-120 FPS high-end gaming experience and our full-fledged eSports Spectator mode!
HIGH-END GRAPHICS
- Frame Rate settings — enjoy the smoothest gameplay ever at 60 FPS on most devices and 120 FPS on Razer Phone
SPECTATOR GALORE
- New Spectator mode — use 3rd person and top-down cameras to freely switch between players during matches
- Restrict Spectating in Private Matches to prevent stream sniping
- AR Spectator for Android is finally here!
BALANCE UPDATE
- Rebalanced 6 guns
summary: Explosive FPS with super easy controls and non-stop PvP action!
title: Guns of Boom - Online Shooter

description: Geometry Dash is back with a brand new adventure! New levels, new music, new monsters, new everything! Flex your clicky finger as you jump, fly and flip your way through dark caves and spiky obstacles. Discover the lands, play online levels and find the secrets hidden within the World of Geometry Dash!• Rhythm-based Action Platforming!• Ten unique levels with music from Dex Arson, Waterflame and F-777!• Play daily quests and earn rewards!• Play online levels created by the Geometry Dash community!• Unlock unique icons and colors to customize your character!• Fly rockets, flip gravity and much more!• Use practice mode to sharpen your skills!• Challenge yourself with the near impossible!Approved by RubRub \ (•◡•) /
descriptionHTML:
Geometry Dash is back with a brand new adventure! New levels, new music, new monsters, new everything!

Flex your clicky finger as you jump, fly and flip your way through dark caves and spiky obstacles. Discover the lands, play online levels and find the secrets hidden within the World of Geometry Dash!

• Rhythm-based Action Platforming!
• Ten unique levels with music from Dex Arson, Waterflame and F-777!
• Play daily quests and earn rewards!
• Play online levels created by the Geometry Dash community!
• Unlock unique icons and colors to customize your character!
• Fly rockets, flip gravity and much more!
• Use practice mode to sharpen your skills!
• Challenge yourself with the near impossible!

Approved by RubRub \ (•◡•) /
developerAddress:
Fresta kyrkväg 10
19454 Upplands Väsby
Sweden
recentChanges: - New achievements, chests, unlockables and more!
- Bugfixes and tweaks
Thanks for playing :)
(Download Geometry Dash SubZero if you want to try some new free levels!)
/RubRub
summary: Geometry Dash is back with a brand new adventure!
title: Geometry Dash World

comments: I played this a while back and decided to come back and see if anything had changed and it sure did. There have been several updates that I love (the new maps, new sharks, equipment, etc.) and I'm glad I'm playing it now. In game currency price for items has been balanced out which I love and the missions system is much better now. I would highly recommend this game to anyone who likes progression-based time-killing games like Hungry Shark World.

This game is amazing! Everyone needs to play this. I would've given a fifth star however you need to not only buy all XXL sharks to unlock the "!!" Sharks but max them out. Definitely download this, just one tip. Don't delete when you have progress. I've downloaded, played, got bored, and deleted 3 times. Now I'm never deleting it. I have so much progress, if I never deleted it the first time I would have everything in the game

Finally! For the the longest time I've been waited, the gaming performance has been improved! No more annoying lag and the gameplay feel a lot smoother now and I am so happy about it. But the graphics still needs to be improved because it doesn't look too good and some minor bug needs to be fixed.

Favourite Shark game in the entire world. I became obsessed because it's so addictive and fun. The graphics are amazing, disappointed when I got my new phone I lost my progress even when I used the smart transfer to transfer the app. I've had to start all over again... but the fun continues!

Do not upgrade your Sharks.  The bigger the shark, the more difficult it is to play.  Big sharks have more drain on health and hunger, causing you to die more frequently. Impassable areas due to size of !! shark and less fishes to eat when health gets low.  Not to mention how slow these big sharks move!  The more you spend on bigger sharks, the less fun you'll have.

This game is really addictive and i love it but i own everything now so I don't play anymore. I occasionally get on just to check for new stuff and they do put out new stuff but it takes a long, loooonggggg time. Please put new sharks out and don't make us wait foreverrrr!

No shark is complete without headphones, umbrella and a freakin' jetpack!MANIC MISSIONS & BADASS BOSSESTake on more than 20 different types of mission including high score challenges, prey hunts and epic boss fights!HELPFUL PREDATORY PETSBaby sharks, whales, an octopus, and even a bald eagle are happy to help with special abilities to increase health, score and more!SUPERSIZED MEAL DEALUnleash your shark's predator potential: SuperSize mode, rushes, explosion, hypnosis and more! descriptionHTML:
*** Hungry Shark World Selected in Google Play’s Best Games of 2016 collection ***
The Sharks are back in the bigger and badder sequel to Hungry Shark Evolution!
Control a shark in a feeding frenzy and eat your way through many oceans feasting on everything from bite-size fish and birds to tasty whales and unwitting humans!
***This game is only compatible with devices running on Android 4.2 or above***

MORE THAN 20 SHARK SPECIES
Choose from a range of sharks in 7 different size tiers, including the most iconic ocean predator: the Great White!

HUGE OPEN WORLDS
Explore the lush Pacific Islands, frozen Arctic Ocean, exotic Arabian Sea, and now the South China Sea, a vibrant urban destination full of fresh, unwary victims!

FEAST FOR YOUR EYES
Experience the feeding frenzy in stunning console quality 3D graphics that will blow everything else out of the water!

SURVIVAL OF THE HUNGRIEST
It’s eat or be eaten in waters packed with 100s of delicious and dangerous creatures… Whales, submarines and wandering locals BEWARE!

SMASHING SHARK SWAG
Level up your shark and equip jawsome gadgets to bite harder, swim faster and grow even hungrier! No shark is complete without headphones, umbrella and a freakin' jetpack!

MANIC MISSIONS & BADASS BOSSES
Take on more than 20 different types of mission including high score challenges, prey hunts and epic boss fights!

HELPFUL PREDATORY PETS
Baby sharks, whales, an octopus, and even a bald eagle are happy to help with special abilities to increase health, score and more!

SUPERSIZED MEAL DEAL
Unleash your shark's predator potential: SuperSize mode, rushes, explosion, hypnosis and more!

INTUITIVE TILT CONTROLS
Back by popular demand, now you can control your shark simply by tilting your phone!

Google Play Leaderboards and Achievements enabled.
Use Facebook to synchronise your progress across your GP devices.
Hungry Shark World is regularly updated with new features, content and challenges to keep you coming back for more!
This app contains In-App Purchases which allow you to buy Gems and Gold currency which can be spent on upgrades and accessories. Gems and Gold can also be collected in game without requiring purchases.
This game contains advertising. Advertising is disabled if you make any purchase.

Like the game on Facebook for the latest news: www.facebook.com/HungrySharkWorld
Follow us on Twitter @Hungry_Shark
Or Youtube: http://youtube.com/FutureGamesOfLondon
And join our community!
Facebook http://facebook.com/UbisoftMobileGames
Twitter http://twitter.com/ubisoftmobile
Youtube http://youtube.com/user/Ubisoft

Any Feedback? Contact: http://support.ubi.com
Need support? Contact: http://support.ubi.com
developerAddress:
UBISOFT MOBILE GAMES
38-42 rue Cuvier
93100 Montreuil Sous Bois
FRANCE
recentChanges: JOIN THE LUNAR FESTIVITIES and celebrate the Year of the Dog with special surprises.
- COMING SOON: Your new best friend will be arriving in time for the Lunar New Year!
- NEW POWER-UPS: chomp jellyfish with Jelly Eater, and don’t slow down for anything with Unstoppable!
- NEW YEAR: celebrate the Lunar New Year with Red Envelopes and a Lantern Festival!
- PERFORMANCE: faster loading times and higher frame rates.
summary: Take control of a very Hungry Shark in this action packed aquatic adventure!
title: Hungry Shark World

comments: The original sonic dash is better imo. had a better atmosphere, maps looks better gameplay also better. the original was a masterpiece. also, I don't like that they introduce scenes that requires you to tilt your phone. since i played sonic dash i didn't expect it to be there. it's annoying when you're laying down and play the game and you got that scene just ruins the gameplay.

The responsiveness of the controls I  this game make it unplayable... it's slightly more responsive than the original sonic dash but it's still no where near good enough for such a fast paced game.  I tested this on other devices before I posted this review and it's the same on all of them

Way too many advertisements. I actually downloaded this game because subway surfer makes start over everytime you download it but after my next tech upgrade I'm going back to that, atleast the game not flooded with ads.

I would give it 5 stars, I made an in app purchase to remove ads, but after the game updated non Sega ads started showing again and it asked me to make another purchase in order to remove the non Sega ads AGAIN... love the game, hate the ads...

Ads are back. I paid for a red ring bundle, which did remove them for a while, but they're back. The only reason I made a real purchase was so that I wouldn't have ads, so can someone please remove the ads from my account. On another note, I really like this, and nice to see Shadow playable again.
This game can't even load.When it's done loading it crashes my phone. GOD HELP US ALL FROM THIS BULLCRAP OF A GAY FREAKIN GAM

comments: I kind of miss the old version because isn't that why they came out with a 2nd game so if we eant more we got it.  Also, after I play each round therr is a ad and I wish I could just play not play waut gor 2 ads play ad play ad ad ad ad. On the plus side, I like how it has stickers and how you can make your own ean I think that factor is really cool and a way to interact with the game.

This game is both funny as serious it's a great way to make kids understand the danger of some things around them. Like trains and wires and different things. As funny and silly this app is it can be a bit gross. Like blood and organs and stuff. The more this game updates the better it gets keep those updates coming. GREAT game.

I played 3 years ago, then came back now, alot changed! I still love it! Though, when I'm playing the game with Botch, and I cover up the bullet holes, my phone only allows 2 fingers to touch at once, so I usually can't complete the daily challenges, so I think that we should have the option to disable that game👍
I think that there could be less ads. When I'm trying to replay he game an ad pops up which is really annoying. What I would say is that this is an excellent game but just less of the ads

A truly wonderful and entertaining game. Very well supported with great updates over the years. Latest version (Valentine's) appears to be buggy (animations jerk ahead) ruining the gameplay. I'm unsure it this is the game or my phone.

I like it a lot this game is so good but there is one thing that really bugs me.  There is way to many ads.  Every time I play a set of games to get a good score and I click play again or main menu or practice it gives me an ad.  This really bothers me please put less ads or at least do not make them quite as long.
description: You've seen the video - now the lives of those charmingly dumb characters are in your hands.Enjoy 52 hilarious mini-games as you attempt to collect all the charmingly dumb characters for your train station, achieve high scores and unlock the famous music video that started it all.Download the FREE game now to enjoy the new fun and remember, be safe around trains. A message from Metro.GAMEPLAY- Why is his hair on fire? Who cares, just RUN!- Quickly wipe your screen free of puke- Balance that wobbling glue eater- Flick the piranhas out of range of those precious private parts- Swat wasps before it's too late- Best not invite that psycho killer inside- Carefully remove forks from toasters- Help self-taught pilots- Get back from the edge of the platform you fools- Have patience at level crossings- No crossing the tracks! Not even for balloons!- And who knew rattlesnakes were so picky about mustard?- Doing your own electrical work? Choose the wires carefully- Mind the gap! Board the train safely- Space is no fun without a helmet. Put it on now!- Stop the clothes dryer. It’s a terrible hiding place!- Scratched the drug dealer’s ride, now avoid his bat- Taking expired medicine is not recommended- Stitch it up before bleeding out! - Perform a daring rescue from a burning building- Drag appliances back on the shelf to prevent accidents- Remember to stop at level crossings- Everyone loves bacon!  Even rattlesnakes!- Rotate the wires to complete the circuit- Only cross at pedestrian crossings - Remember the sequence for a fireworks show- Swipe to avoid a prickly crash- Sprung a leak?  Sprint to the shore!- Tap to tip toe to the ice cream- Keep the wasp nest from hitting the ground - Avoid eating rotten food- Leap over forest obstacles- Screw down the glue cap- Find the psycho before he finds you!- Smash the asteroids - Hunt for treasure, but don’t get hunted yourself- Ready, aim, and fire yourself onto an opposing galleon- Walk the plank, but don’t fall over- Barricade your home to stave off zombies- Follow the recipe to brew the perfect potion- Feed the bear candy before he feeds on you- Build the perfect snowman, but watch out for pointy carrots- Pouring drinks from a rickety ladder is inadvisable- Time your jump or get stuck in a chimney- Package the chocolates or feel love’s bite- Don’t Dumb with scissors- Drive up to a scenic lookout (but make sure to brake)PLUS- Perfect your dumb-death prevention skills to unlock the full set of characters for your train station- Create your own Dumb Ways character from loads of facial features, accessories and more!Watch the original Webby and Cannes award-winning video here: www.youtube.com/watch?v=IJNR2EpS0jw
descriptionHTML:
You've seen the video - now the lives of those charmingly dumb characters are in your hands.

Enjoy 52 hilarious mini-games as you attempt to collect all the charmingly dumb characters for your train station, achieve high scores and unlock the famous music video that started it all.

Download the FREE game now to enjoy the new fun and remember, be safe around trains. A message from Metro.

GAMEPLAY

- Don’t Dumb with scissors

PLUS
- Perfect your dumb-death prevention skills to unlock the full set of characters for your train station
- Create your own Dumb Ways character from loads of facial features, accessories and more!

Watch the original Webby and Cannes award-winning video here: www.youtube.com/watch?v=IJNR2EpS0jw

recentChanges: Love is in the air! Our friends have discovered even more Dumb Ways to Die in three new mini-games!
HEARTS AND CRAFTS – Calamity is working her heart out on a set of crafts. Keep her hand steady to make sure she doesn’t get too cut up.
THE BRAKE-UP – The most romantic lookout in the city is also the most dangerous. Help Bonehead brake before his car breaks him.
DEATH IS LIKE A BOX OF CHOCOLATES – Fill Mishap’s box with chocolate, and fast – his cold-blooded friend is growing impatient.

description: Poor Phil Faily has had a lot of bad luck with cars...  now he has a Motorbike!While doing some sightseeing on a motorbike in the Nevada desert, Phil is forced off the road, plunging him over the edge of a steep embankment and into a world of dangerous hazards and obstacles.In this physics based motorbike game you must maneuver an endless mountainside dodging hazardous terrain such as cacti, rocks, traffic and trains resulting in some fun and hilarious near misses and crashes.New vehicles. New tracks. Same Faily fun.FEATURES•	NAVIGATE downhill as far as you can go avoiding obstacles along the way•	AVOID cacti, rocks, creeks, traffic and trains•	DESTROY obstacles with your shield or weapons•	COLLECT coins as you go •	UNLOCK unique vehicles and costumes•	RECORD gameplay and share to Youtube, Facebook or Instagram•	ENDLESS gameplay•	ENDLESS crashes•	ENDLESS fun!* Permissions Details *Faily Rider will require access to photos, media and files on your device. This is only used to cache the advertising in game and to allow the sharing of custom screenshots taken in game.
descriptionHTML:
Poor Phil Faily has had a lot of bad luck with cars... now he has a Motorbike!

While doing some sightseeing on a motorbike in the Nevada desert, Phil is forced off the road, plunging him over the edge of a steep embankment and into a world of dangerous hazards and obstacles.

In this physics based motorbike game you must maneuver an endless mountainside dodging hazardous terrain such as cacti, rocks, traffic and trains resulting in some fun and hilarious near misses and crashes.

New vehicles. New tracks. Same Faily fun.

FEATURES
• NAVIGATE downhill as far as you can go avoiding obstacles along the way
• AVOID cacti, rocks, creeks, traffic and trains
• DESTROY obstacles with your shield or weapons
• COLLECT coins as you go
• UNLOCK unique vehicles and costumes
• RECORD gameplay and share to Youtube, Facebook or Instagram
• ENDLESS gameplay
• ENDLESS crashes
• ENDLESS fun!


* Permissions Details *
Faily Rider will require access to photos, media and files on your device. This is only used to cache the advertising in game and to allow the sharing of custom screenshots taken in game.

Level 1/324 Wickham st.
PO BOX 326
Fortitude Valley
Brisbane, QLD 4006
Australia

description: Are you ready for a no-nonsense, action packed first person shooter?Critical Ops is a fast-paced FPS that will test your reflexes and tactical skill.  Experience a critical antiterrorist operation. Fight for domination alongside your friends or show the world your skill by leading the individual scoreboard.  Join the competitive combat in the most skill-based portable FPS!Game currently in Alpha phase: Critical Ops is still under development, but you can download and play the game now! We will keep working on the game continuously to fix bugs, improve optimization and add a ton of new features and content to the game!The game currently features 4 game modes: Defuse, Team Deathmatch, Ranked Games, and Gun Game.In defuse the terrorists try to plant and explode a bomb while the counter-terrorists try to prevent the bomb from exploding.In Team Deathmatch the teams compete for dominance within a time limit.In ranked games, the players are awarded points for every game that they win.Gun Game is a game mode that is played in teams, but all players individually work their way through all the weapons in the game.Critical Ops is not and will never be pay-to-win: Purchase comes to customize your favourite weapons.Follow us on social media:Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/CriticalOpsGame/Twitter: https://twitter.com/CriticalOpsGameYouTube: https://www.youtube.com/user/CriticalForceEntDiscord: http://discord.gg/criticalopsPrivacy Policy: http://criticalopsgame.com/privacy/Terms of Service: http://criticalopsgame.com/terms/
descriptionHTML:
Are you ready for a no-nonsense, action packed first person shooter?

Critical Ops is a fast-paced FPS that will test your reflexes and tactical skill. Experience a critical antiterrorist operation. Fight for domination alongside your friends or show the world your skill by leading the individual scoreboard. Join the competitive combat in the most skill-based portable FPS!

Game currently in Alpha phase: Critical Ops is still under development, but you can download and play the game now! We will keep working on the game continuously to fix bugs, improve optimization and add a ton of new features and content to the game!

The game currently features 4 game modes: Defuse, Team Deathmatch, Ranked Games, and Gun Game.
In defuse the terrorists try to plant and explode a bomb while the counter-terrorists try to prevent the bomb from exploding.
In Team Deathmatch the teams compete for dominance within a time limit.
In ranked games, the players are awarded points for every game that they win.
Gun Game is a game mode that is played in teams, but all players individually work their way through all the weapons in the game.

Critical Ops is not and will never be pay-to-win: Purchase comes to customize your favourite weapons.

Follow us on social media:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/CriticalOpsGame/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/CriticalOpsGame
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/user/CriticalForceEnt
Discord: http://discord.gg/criticalops

Privacy Policy: http://criticalopsgame.com/privacy/
Terms of Service: http://criticalopsgame.com/terms/
developerAddress: Kauppakatu 7, 2 krs - 87100 - Kajaani, Finland

summary: eSports 3D multiplayer First Person Shooter
title: Critical Ops

description: Come and be a part of the gaming revolution that SALT is. Play something new every day. If you love challenges, adventures, and games, you are at the best place you could possibly be. We promise to take you on an unending adventure with new challenges, new stories, and a brand new game every day.In life, you encounter a lot of problems. Problems with studies, problems with exams, problems with relationships, problems of finance and what not. And just when you think you have a solution to a particular problem, Life throws at you a brand new problem.Well, solving problems of life isn't much fun but cracking games can be. And you know it. Especially when it comes to challenging your friends and beating them at it. Ever imagined yourself living a different life every single day. One day you are a politician, on another day you are a doctor, on some other day you are a businessman, one day you are an engineer. Okay! Let's leave the engineers out of it. Sorry once again! In fact, the game changes every day. Yes! Every single day. On Monday, you are figuring out a way to help Mr. Stick escape the murderous Pie Man. On Tuesday, you are defending your planet against the invasion of aliens. On Wednesday, you have to navigate through laser walls to save your life. You might need to kill everything that comes in the way. #JustSayingOn Thursday, you need to help the squares reclaim their rights in the autocratic world of rectangles. On Friday, you suddenly find yourself in a pond of fishes and as some old Mr Darwin said, “Only the fittest survive”, you need to feed yourself and avoid everything else in the fish-eat-fish world.On Saturday, you have to figure out a strategy to build bridges between squares and rectangles to make this world a peaceful place.On Sunday. Yes, we know it's a Sunday! You are required to just chill and drive your way through small obstacles to your destinations.And the best part is that the surprise element is the only constant that you will get here. No Sunday will ever be the same again. And no Monday will be as dull(?) as it was the previous week. Join us on this journey of SALT where just like life we offer you a brand new set of challenges and maybe wars every single day, albeit in a much simpler way. Our games are easy to learn but hard to master. On top of that, you will have only 24 hours to stake a claim for becoming the 'Best'. Challenge your buddies, set new high scores and brag about it. Make your games more interesting, accept new challenges and most importantly as our beloved MS Dhoni puts it -- "Enjoy The Game"!And as a sie man once put it."The only way to make sense out of change is to plunge into it, move with it and join the dance."Come join the SALT adventure.
descriptionHTML:
Come and be a part of the gaming revolution that SALT is. Play something new every day.
If you love challenges, adventures, and games, you are at the best place you could possibly be. We promise to take you on an unending adventure with new challenges, new stories, and a brand new game every day.

In life, you encounter a lot of problems. Problems with studies, problems with exams, problems with relationships, problems of finance and what not. And just when you think you have a solution to a particular problem, Life throws at you a brand new problem.
Well, solving problems of life isn't much fun but cracking games can be. And you know it. Especially when it comes to challenging your friends and beating them at it.

Ever imagined yourself living a different life every single day. One day you are a politician, on another day you are a doctor, on some other day you are a businessman, one day you are an engineer. Okay! Let's leave the engineers out of it. Sorry once again!

Wouldn't the surprise element in the aforementioned cases be amazing?
Wouldn't you just look forward to waking up from your bed every single day to try to find out what awaits you today?
Wouldn't the excitement levels be extremely high if there was something like this?
Well, there is!

SALT brings to you a wide variety of games. In fact, the game changes every day. Yes! Every single day.

On Monday, you are figuring out a way to help Mr. Stick escape the murderous Pie Man.
On Tuesday, you are defending your planet against the invasion of aliens.
On Wednesday, you have to navigate through laser walls to save your life. You might need to kill everything that comes in the way. #JustSaying
On Thursday, you need to help the squares reclaim their rights in the autocratic world of rectangles.
On Friday, you suddenly find yourself in a pond of fishes and as some old Mr Darwin said, “Only the fittest survive”, you need to feed yourself and avoid everything else in the fish-eat-fish world.
On Saturday, you have to figure out a strategy to build bridges between squares and rectangles to make this world a peaceful place.
On Sunday. Yes, we know it's a Sunday! You are required to just chill and drive your way through small obstacles to your destinations.
And the best part is that the surprise element is the only constant that you will get here. No Sunday will ever be the same again. And no Monday will be as dull(?) as it was the previous week.

Join us on this journey of SALT where just like life we offer you a brand new set of challenges and maybe wars every single day, albeit in a much simpler way.
Our games are easy to learn but hard to master. On top of that, you will have only 24 hours to stake a claim for becoming the 'Best'. Challenge your buddies, set new high scores and brag about it. (That's what high scores are for!)

Make your games more interesting, accept new challenges and most importantly as our beloved MS Dhoni puts it -- "Enjoy The Game"!

And as a sie man once put it.
"The only way to make sense out of change is to plunge into it, move with it and join the dance."
Come join the SALT adventure.
summary: Take a plunge into a new beginning every 24 hours & play something new every day
title: SALT - Play Something New Everyday

comments: Great strategy based game, awesome, however out of 326 levels only 323 could be completed. Level 324 the colors are not chain linked they are totally erratic and the colors you're given are inconsistent. They alternate in color as well to ensure failure. Still I enjoyed it. Side note, I played the game without using any cheats, which is the reason level 324 is a trapdoor the idea is to purchase cheats. Thanks great game.
The coding in this game obviously needs work.  Balls given not colors needed.  Spot aimed at missed and ball lands somewhere else.  The last chest I opened lvl 30 something gave no item.

Fun, but... Worst aim system. You can see ball curve away instead of following straight path. Color balls rotate without your input. You are shooting blue, but yellow goes instead. This happens very frequently. Lastly, had 20 straight of same color. Only needed one of another color to finish that level. Still playing, but game is very frustrating.

Must be the shortest time I have had a game installed. Pace of gameplay is SLOW and I hate the voice of the game. So annoying! If I could skip the animation before and after a level it would be much better.
Takes so long to start a level you have lost interest in the game before it starts. Keeps my attention for about 30 secs. Phone will not respond to button presses after game has finished.

description: Dumb Ways to Die brought you the dumb little Beans that the world fell in love with. Now it’s time for another dumbfounding adventure! Help rebuild and keep the once great town of Dumbville safe, travel to the scorching deserts of Dumbgypt, hike to the frosty summit of Dumb Peak and journey to the curious planet of Dumbtune in Dumb Ways to Die 3: World Tour. Game Features: • Get your tools ready to help make the town of Dumbville and the rest of the Dumb World safe once again.• Collect and play as your favourite Beans!• Send the Beans down the steep slopes of Dumb Peak - but watch out for those cheeky penguins.• Launch the Beans through asteroid fields deep in space.• Soar through the skies above Dumbville in a crazy plane flight!• Dash through the mighty Pyramids of Dumb-Gypt.• Collect unique outfits for all the Beans!• Do your best to keep the Beans safe - but if they do get hurt, patch them up in the hospital!

Experiment with the location and pictures size. Get the tattoo to look realistic and share the result with the friends.
Try one tattoo by one. You do not feel pain at all. You dont to worry about tattoo removed - just press the "Delete" button. Publish photos on the social, and maybe the tattoos will be cooler than popular benchmarks and artists.
summary: Neon virtual tattoos in the phone
title: Neon Tattoo Simulator

comments: i would have rated it higher til i was forced to start a new mission with Pooh Bear. all of my characters are having to do things not for the usual money to used to buy things i need to upgrade and expand my kingdom, they now earn Pooh bucks for the next 20 some odd days. not everyone likes to play a game that has forced side quests. i dont like some characters cost a lot of actual money to unlock. If a child is playing this and wants their favorite character, parents are having to shell out money to keep them happy. it should be either buy it or earn it.

Grafics are amazing!!! Constantly wanting you to buy gems that help you move along in the game.  You can send characters on tasks that are suppose to drop needed parts you need to advance and they rarely drop. Not sure why different updates cause the game to crash more often. But again,  when it works, the Grafics are really cute!

It was fun until it won't stay on long enough to do anything.  I have started it 6times this morning!!!  This has been going on for awhile but today crazy.. I am going to uninstall it if there is no fix soon..  I have played this game going on 2yrs.. very frustrating..it runs even worse since y The stupid update..thanks for nothing!!!!

This game is really cute and fun. I greatly enjoy it. However, the resource cost jumps quickly to ridiculous rates and there is no ability to assist friends. I could get over the resource cost if friend visiting and helping were to be added. That would make this review go from a 3 to a 5.

Awesome game. It's Disney and you don't have to stay on it all day unless you want too.lol. The only issue I would have is that it is very difficult to get some characters. I kept trying for Mulan all the way thru when she was available and never got her. Then i got treasure chests and got alot of stone dragons and no Mulan either. But I still love my Disney game. Been playing almost since it came out. Thank you for a wonderful game.

You guys need to up the gems for watching videos 1 gem is just not enough, you guys are making it so hard to collect characters, it takes months just to collect a character worth gems it is ridiculous. Also for some reason since the pooh bear update began i keep getting kicked out of game play it is getting frustrating coz i actually enjoy playing this game. It brings out my inner child

comments: Loved the game for the first few minutes as it is very simple and interesting. BUT may photos temperature started to climb and quickly shot through the roof to a point where it literally burns you! And it kills your battery! For a simple game like this these facts fore me to give only one star. Fix the code and improve the graphics and it can easily get a 4 to 5 star rating.

Great time waster, I've been checking in on it every day for about a month. My biggest problem with the game is that there aren't enough prestige balls, once you get thunder there is almost no incentive to keep playing. I hope that more prestige balls are added in some future update. Otherwise, this is a flawless mobile game. There aren't too many ads, the graphical design is very simple yet effective, and the draw to keep coming back lasts for a long time. It takes a WHILE to get all 5 prestige balls.

Silly pointless battery killing little game, I loved it! The game kinda runs out of puff after level 150 though, as there is nothing else to achieve. I've got all the prestige balls, all the regular balls, all above level 150. Can we have some higher order balls above Thunder please?

This is a cute little fun game but it keeps crashing I can't even open it so therefore that's why you got such low reviews. I was having a lot of fun with it until it started crashing. Even uninstalling and reinstalling did not fix the problem. I hope you eventually get it fixed it would be worth downloading again.

Game play is alright but the adverts are annoying! Especially ones where come back on the game to get points: you can watch video for x2 the amount or just collect... Even the just collect end up watching a video! So might as well just have as x2

Looks BORING at first. But I can't put it down now. And to those complaining about the adds, spam the back button after they start. The only adds this doesn't work for are the ones with the fast forward button in the top left
description: Scratch your multi-tasking itch!Play Idle Balls in front of your favorite show, in a boring class or meeting - without missing the important stuff.-Free to play-Endless gameplay and upgrades-No internet connection needed

comments: I Would Give It Five Stars...but...you should make it customizable for the colors you want to cycle through as you stack higher. THIS GAME IS NOT COLOR BLIND FRIENDLY. Great Idea Though, Nice Hand Eye Coordination Exercise. (I see Black and White, so a monochrome setting would be nice. Other people see colors differently as well) Needs A Color Cycle Customizer, or a set of different options for each type of Color Blind. Thanks in advance

Great simple game with AMAZING colours❤ I love this...dead simple and fun. It took me ages to work out how to unlock the new skins...click on the banner that has the amount of diamonds you've collected and what looks like 3 sheets on top of one another  (it comes up before you press the start key...)

A Great Game For When You're Dumpin'. I decided to install it because I ran out of YouTube videos while droppin' a duce. I really enjoy and will be using it the next time I'm in here as well. The ads are there, but they aren't too bad and there is an option to remove them for a small fee as well (which I plan to do.) My time in the bathroom has flew by because of the game and I'm happy to say that. I don't like to stay too long. Great game!

So,  basically it's a pretty fun app to play when you're bored. It's a great time killer, and is very challenging, but at the same time easy! It's a perfect app! I remember I downloaded this, and then I uninstalled it because I needed other apps on my phone. And now I installed it again, so then I have a fun game to play. I don't really have any games on my phone, so this is the perfect one. The inventors are genius! Five stars!!

Challenging and aesthetically pleasing A well made, minimalist stacking game which takes a long time to master, with nice simple visuals, a satisfying game mechanic and good sound effects. The instant replayability makes for a good competitive game amongst friends. The only reason it doesn't have a 5* is because I feel more could have been added to it, and done with the mechanic.

Good, with a major flaw I've ran into an issue that occurs about 1 out of every 3 rounds, where I'll tap, and the game won't register the trap until well after the position I wanted. For a game based on timing and your ability to stack moving blocks, when you tap is important, and needs to be 100% reliable. I'm on a Nexus 6P, very new phone with excellent hardware. I've closed all background apps, to try and troubleshoot. It's an issue I'd like to see fixed.
description: Stack up the blocks as high as you can!◉ Simple & Beautiful graphics designed◉ Compete for the best score in the world

comments: This is an extremely fun game. O have a few suggestions on how to fix things on the game. I noticed three things while playing this game. 1. There is not a continue playing option. This can easily be fixed and with all of the great work from Dvloper I think that this is not too far away. 2. I noticed you can uncrouch in the tunnel in the basement even though you are not all the way through. 3. Everything is in a certain place. If one object is in a certain place then if you are familiar with the game enough you will know where the other objects are. To be honest this is not a minor concern but still could be fixed. Other than that I can't stop playing! Thank you so much!!

It's really really really fun game.  But I think if you guys do some more improvements so it will be much fun.  Here's what I think:  1. I think you should make the house much bigger.  2. You should add more enemies for example:  child o' slenderina,  slenderman and the spiders.  3. You should add an Adventure mode.  Where you need to find some books or something like an emblem like that stuff to make them uncursed like that.  4. Last but not least, you should add more weapons for example:  Pistol,  sword,  injection etc.    If you do that,  it will be super cool and fun.   ThanQ 😃👍

It's definatly one of the better (more fun) horror games on the store, but I feel like there could be some more improvements. Firstly I think that if you've completed hard than there should be an (almost) impossible mode. Also minor details such as different textures and Easter eggs would be good. Last, I think that when you escape there should be an outside section where it's still got puzzles but it's more about the atmosphere. (Maybe that could just be for the "impossible mode") but it would make the game a lot more enjoyable. Also maybe a reward for escaping. (For incentive). Thank you and maybe you could take this into consideration :) also new app icon plz

Who doesn't love this game? It's bone chilling and exciting for the whole family (Litterally my whole fam plays this game) it would be cool to have a mode where there was no granny just to explore the house and get a feel for how to escape. Also some weapons to attack granny. Lastly a map of where granny is would be super cool. Good luck!

I love this game but please fix these: 1)Things in the same place when you die 2)The house is bigger 3)Show like a heart beat when Granny is near and not just foot step's. 4) A animal would be cool to help you around the house. 5)More weapons such as, Guns, Knifes, Ect. Lastly that when Granny steps on the bear traps she can get court to and maybe a Granddad! Other then that, This game is amazing and I can't stop playing and be glad to know my hole school is playing it and you hear it every turn you make! Not a joke! Keep it up!  =D

This is an early game with a bunch of potential. I love the game and I'm always playing it but I feel like you can expand the game with these additions. Firstly, why not add in a collectible menu where you can hunt extremely hard-to-find collection of items within Granny's house. Also you could possibly add another, backdoor exit to the house. This would mean being able to escape a different way. Finally you could add another whole game mode where you escape the house in a different way. (You could even add in a whole new mechanic but don't make it too complex!)
description: Welcome to Granny.Granny keeps you locked in her house.Now you have to try to get out of her house, but be careful and quiet. She hears everything.If you drop something on the floor, she hears it and comes running.You can hide in wardrobes or under beds.You have 5 days.Good luck!The game contains advertisement.
descriptionHTML:
Welcome to Granny.

Granny keeps you locked in her house.
Now you have to try to get out of her house, but be careful and quiet. She hears everything.
If you drop something on the floor, she hears it and comes running.
You can hide in wardrobes or under beds.
You have 5 days.

Good luck!

The game contains advertisement.
developerAddress: *******vägen
recentChanges: * A little bigger house.
* Added Hard difficulty.
* Opportunity to get a bonus day (only Normal and Easy).
* An extra lock on the main door (Only Hard).
* Now you can drop items on beartraps to disarm them.
* Granny's got legs :)
* Small change of the menu.
summary: Granny keeps you locked in her house.
title: Granny

comments: A very fun and addictive game. I make bows all day, but it's nice to be able to shoot from my couch at night.  The influence of wind on the arrow is accurate when it comes to drift. A little costly on the upgrades for those that don't buy their way to the top, but all games are that way.
Ok game, but bingo mode is a huge pain.  My shots filled out the opponent's card better than mine.  Stupid way to lose a lot of progress/coins.

I'm having issues with the speed/timed sessions.  Towards the end, the animation sequence will glitch, resulting in my opponent having time to get off an additional shot, while I'm attempting to reset and draw the bow.  Outside of that, it's an excellent game.

Game would be great if it didn't lag out after 6 games. I've lost more gold in rush due to the game's performance degrading than I can keep track of. Once it starts losing frame rate just quit or you will bleed gold.

Game was fine. Lately, keeps freezing and somehow opponents are getting 10's when I CLEARLY see them hitting nowhere near the middle. Matches are freezing while i'm ahead, then match ends and says I lost. Somehow i've lost 20 million coins, and not from legit losing either. I also just played a match for 1 million coins, i had over 1 million in the bank. I know sonehow have 0 after I clearly won the match but it said I lost. Either people are using cheats or the game is not functioning properly

The friends system is all jacked up...   I share a Facebook, we can't use Google ID to each have our own.. And even existing friends do not show up. Fun game if you don't mind playing alone in a big lonely world of emoji.

comments: My education calls me a scientist and as such I'm skeptical of this type of product. They proved me wrong. Of course there are details that can skew results but every time I tested this and found the numbers to be incorrect, they were my mistake not the app's. I cannot as yet recommend it for absolutes if precision is mandatory for the project at hand, but with very little practice an acceptable +/- of less than 3-5% is dependable. Highly recommend for any instance where time is valuable and close approximations are acceptable. Really a welcome tool for my home projects.
Read the tutorial and it works very good. Values can be screenshoted too
Quite accurate at everything I've measured in the house. Outdoors to be tried in daylight.
Very convenient tool any time u need
Useful app for rough estimation
It seems to be reasonably accurate I would love to to see it'd be able to measure approach velocity
description: *** Please note: This app will give you an estimation of the distance or the height! The results depend on the correctness of your sensors and can have a deviation up to 20 %. ***With Distance Laser Meter you have a strong device to measure the distance and height to objects around you. You can easily detect the distance to an object or the height of the object. No special skills or knowledge is required to use this app!  Measure now the distance of your room and get the result in meters, centimeters, inches or feet. This app will turn your device into a strong distance laser meter! Surprise your friends and family with this app! Use the distance meter to measure the height of a building or to measure the distance to it!

comments: Bought all the babies when I first downloaded the app. Everything was working great. So when the most recent (3) babies were available for purchase I bought them, but now those babies don't work!.... I'll give five stars when you get them to work. In the meantime, I think I should get a refund on my money.

I would like to give a better rating, since my 3yld loves this app.  But the newest babies are not working and there is no support on the Disney app page.  Would love to get this issue reported and fixed before they try to screw everyone over with 3 more dolls that freeze the game.

I'm very unhappy!! Since the update my daughter can no longer play with the babies I bought, only the free ones. She is constantly bugging me to buy them again, but since I have already purchased them I do not think I should have to. Please may I have a full refund so I can purchase again or better yet fix the problem, then I can give 5*

My daughter loves this game and plays it all the time. I just bought her all of the last babies today for her to have them all and the bottle freezes and she can't play with her new babies. If someone could fix this for me or refund me that would be great. I just got 6 new babies and she can't use any of them which is ashame cause she loves this game.

Bought the game early on, then after an update with new babies they mixed the new babies in.  So you are left with a child constantly wanting the new babies.  A horrible money grab.  Otherwise a fun game.  Shoyld not show the locked babies mixed in with purchased ones.

Dang, I wish the purchases I made on 6 more babies for my daughter would just work! She loves the app, but gets frustrated that the whole app freezes when she clicks to play one of the other babies. Wouldn't recommend this app because of that... it's just stealing my money..
description: Play along in Doc McStuffins: Baby Nursery, the first free-to-download Doc McStuffins app. There’s so much you can do to take care of your very own adorable baby dolls, with the help of Doc McStuffins herself! •	CeCe and Bunny baby dolls are ready for you to bring home, name, and accessorize.Zebra, Penguin, Butterfly, Bumblebee, Ladybug, Turtle, Panda, Puppy, Kitty and Lobster baby dolls are also available through in-app purchase.     •	Care for your baby dolls by bathing, feeding, napping, and playing fun, interactive games with them. •	You can even capture their special moments and earn stickers in your very own customizable baby book.So much to do!  •       12 baby dolls: Collect all nine—each with a unique theme, nursery, outfits & accessories•	Meal time: Feed your baby doll different yummy meals•	Play time: Bond with ticklish laughs and giggles•	Peek-a-boo: Surprise and delight to watch their silly responses •	Bath time: Give a soothing bath with lots of bubbles and fun•	Change station: Change diapers and play dress up with adorable outfits •	Nap time: Soothe your baby doll to sleep with different sights & sounds •	Baby Book: Capture your baby dolls’ special moments in your very own, customizable baby book•	Bouncer: Play with many activities like the xylophone, twirly flower and more•	Birthday Party: Decorate and celebrate with fun party themes, including your very own cake•	Doc McStuffins and Lambie are on-call to lend a helping hand!Like us on Facebook for cool games tips & the latest news: www.Facebook.com/DisneyGames.Before you download this experience, please consider that this app contains push notifications to let you know when we have exciting updates like new content, as well as advertising for The Walt Disney Family of Companies and some third parties. This mobile app contains in-app purchases and advertising messages, including the option to watch ads for rewards. In-app purchases cost real money and are charged to your account. To disable or adjust the ability to make in-app purchases, adjust your device settings. This is a limited app experience. The full, unlimited app experience is available to purchase at the conclusion of the limited experience. Not all levels or characters are included in the free experience. We respect your wishes regarding your Privacy. You can exercise control and choice by resetting your Advertising Identifier in your device’s Privacy Settings.This app uses the Read/Write_external_storage function to save your game's progress.This app uses your mic to trigger on-screen interactions and animations.Privacy Policy - http://disneyprivacycenter.comChildren’s Privacy Policy - https://disneyprivacycenter.com/kids-privacy-policy/english/Terms of Use - http://disneytermsofuse.com© Disney 2017.
descriptionHTML:
Play along in Doc McStuffins: Baby Nursery, the first free-to-download Doc McStuffins app. There’s so much you can do to take care of your very own adorable baby dolls, with the help of Doc McStuffins herself!


• CeCe and Bunny baby dolls are ready for you to bring home, name, and accessorize.
Zebra, Penguin, Butterfly, Bumblebee, Ladybug, Turtle, Panda, Puppy, Kitty and Lobster baby dolls are also available through in-app purchase.
• Care for your baby dolls by bathing, feeding, napping, and playing fun, interactive games with them.
• You can even capture their special moments and earn stickers in your very own customizable baby book.

So much to do!
• 12 baby dolls: Collect all nine—each with a unique theme, nursery, outfits & accessories
• Meal time: Feed your baby doll different yummy meals
• Play time: Bond with ticklish laughs and giggles
• Peek-a-boo: Surprise and delight to watch their silly responses
• Bath time: Give a soothing bath with lots of bubbles and fun
• Change station: Change diapers and play dress up with adorable outfits
• Nap time: Soothe your baby doll to sleep with different sights & sounds
• Baby Book: Capture your baby dolls’ special moments in your very own, customizable baby book
• Bouncer: Play with many activities like the xylophone, twirly flower and more
• Birthday Party: Decorate and celebrate with fun party themes, including your very own cake
• Doc McStuffins and Lambie are on-call to lend a helping hand!

Like us on Facebook for cool games tips & the latest news: www.Facebook.com/DisneyGames.

Before you download this experience, please consider that this app contains push notifications to let you know when we have exciting updates like new content, as well as advertising for The Walt Disney Family of Companies and some third parties. This mobile app contains in-app purchases and advertising messages, including the option to watch ads for rewards. In-app purchases cost real money and are charged to your account. To disable or adjust the ability to make in-app purchases, adjust your device settings. This is a limited app experience. The full, unlimited app experience is available to purchase at the conclusion of the limited experience. Not all levels or characters are included in the free experience. We respect your wishes regarding your Privacy. You can exercise control and choice by resetting your Advertising Identifier in your device’s Privacy Settings.

This app uses the Read/Write_external_storage function to save your game's progress.
This app uses your mic to trigger on-screen interactions and animations.

Privacy Policy - http://disneyprivacycenter.com
Children’s Privacy Policy - https://disneyprivacycenter.com/kids-privacy-policy/english/
Terms of Use - http://disneytermsofuse.com

© Disney 2017.
developerAddress:
500 South Buena Vista Street
Burbank, CA 91521-0105
United States
recentChanges: CARE FOR 3 NEW BABY DOLLS
Doc and Lambie welcome Butterfly, Penguin and Zebra baby dolls to the nursery- just in time for the holidays.
BABY DOLL CAKE SMASH
Decorate & celebrate with the ALL NEW birthday party activity- you can even let your baby doll smash their birthday cake!
Let the fun (and cake) fly!
summary: Take care of your very own adorable baby dolls along with Lambie & Doc herself!
title: Doc McStuffins: Baby Nursery

comments: Did you write this program on a 2007 droid razr? Cause the loading times are ridiculous for the amount of processing that should be going on in this game. Also, the tutorial was frustrating, and controls terrible.

This game is just impossible to finish, even if you spend lots of real money. 66% of the game (trick and powder) is about pulling tricks out and you can't even choose which ones. Controls are very bad and graphics also. The only thing that makes it more fun is the online challenges, but other than that this game sucks. I would expect a whole lot more from Red Bull.
It's hard to find a winter sports game that's slick and easy to navigate. The tricks are easily achievable. The graphics are pleasing to the eye. Don't like having purchase items to advance.
Last update screwed me I can't play in any contests.
It's REALLY laggy and the tutorial goes on forever about upgrading loading is really long too but the graphics and such are good. But please fix this
Won't connect for any of the feature however the tutorial was very good

descriptionHTML:
Get some sweet air, wicked speed and epic drops!

Welcome to Free Skiing Heroes, your ticket to world ski domination - in the powder, between the gates, and in the air!

Download now and assemble your team of rippers, huckers and powder hounds in this exhilarating, addictive and visually stunning free-to-play game.

COMPETE IN THREE DIFFERENT SKI DISCIPLINES
Collect powder, race and freestyle skier cards for your squad. Start with single player mode, beat your best scores and times, then take your team to competitive PvP skiing events.

EARN REWARDS AND UPGRADE YOUR GEAR
Win runs to earn rewards, then cash in your rewards to collect the sickest (or premium) snow gear for your skiers. Better gear means better stats and skills, and the better your chances of finishing on the podium to earn even more awesome rewards!

DOMINATE THE COMPETITION
Compete in powder, race and trick contests and take part in special, limited-time skiing events. Climb up the leaderboards with single-player and PvP competitions.

SKI EPIC TERRAIN
Ski the best spots like a local in over 40 levels. Hit the steepest runs, deepest powder and most pristine lines with unlimited variation.

Tip and rip!

NOTES:
IMPORTANT
Minimum requirement: 768MB Ram, 1GB+ recommended
Minimum Android OS: 4.0 or newer
Minimum screen resolution: 800x480
Recommended: Android device manufactured in 2014 or newer
Requires online connection to play
developerAddress: Oberst-Lepperdinger-Straße 11-15, 5071 Wals near Salzburg, Austria
recentChanges: Minor improvements
Welcome to Red Bull Free Skiing. Enjoy the mountains!
summary: Assemble your team! Freestyle, Powder and Downhill - own the podium!
title: Red Bull Free Skiing

comments: I love this game. Its very addicting and fun, but I find that there are barely any female dragons. This upsets me very much and I would like for this to change. The only females I see are the dragons with names like  motherly dragon, belle dragon, viktoria dragons, and sleeping beauty dragons. There are also descriptions like "add some girly pink to your collections with the gummy dragon"(which is also coincidently a girl). Then I see cool legendary dragons, but OH plot twist they're all boys. This is a very fun game no doubt on that, but please, stop with the sexism and make cool female dragons. Thank you.

Just a few gripes. 1st of all I LOVE DRAGON CITY. Been playing for years. About your survey, I would never. You ask for too many permissions. Tree of life....when I get a Dragon here comes the same Dragon adding up for hatching. Like why? 815+ dragons are more than enough. Why do u keep adding, adding, adding. We could NEVER get all of them as it is. Why more? Love me some Dragon City like a said in the beginning.

This is #8 for Top Grossing Simulation and you can see in the game that they are trying everything they can to take the #1 spot.  During events they have a unique currency, if you spend real money on that currency and don't use it you're SOL. They don't compensate you by turning it into the next events currency.  Breeding and Hatching eggs takes enormous amounts of time be cause they want you to spend money to speed it up. (The rare the dragon the more tine it takes to breed and hatch, like 10-45hrs from what I've had).  Lastly only get 2 of 5 island, you have to SLOWLY save up crystal or pay real money to unlock them, islands fill up quick. You can youse the free gold but you better have a lot of Facebook friends playing as well or you can't unlock them

I feel that this is a fun and addictive game with lots of potential.. p However , please make quest battles in the arena longer , I was at the last battle but couldn't play it , because it's time was too short . 2 days is not alot, even if I play like 3 times or more a day.

It's a really good game, but just one problem:  there's that island that uses grid coins, and everytime Deus says " this island has a special currency:Grid coins" , it kicks me out of the game. Only when I go into that island and press 'ok' , it kicks me out. Please, Please, PLEASE fix it! I love playing dragon city and monster legends. :(

I really like the game as it relaxes me but there are some issues. Certain videos will restart my game and then I lose the rewards. The puppy video is the worst. The extra islands are OK when you get enough coins to really play them and the battles need work. I don't know how I can win if I am a level 20 and I have to battle a level 30 or higher. I hope some fixes are coming.
description: Ready to take on the hottest role playing game out there and bend fire-breathing dragons to your will? Are you the one to claim the title of top Dragon Master in the world? Accept the challenge and prove your might!Build a Dragon City on floating Islands and fill it with farms, habitats, buildings… and dragons! Collect and train your cute babies and evolve them into impressive beasts that will defend you in the PvP Arenas!Join forces with other Dragon Masters in Alliances, interact in the chat and obtain rewards from the Alliance Chest.Combine dragons of Fire, Nature, War, Legend and lots of other elements to hatch rare hybrids and expand your collection. You can also obtain dragons from exclusive events!FEATURES- Complete the Dragon Book! There are over 500 dragons to breed and collect.- New dragons join the game every week through breeding events and special islands.- Challenge yourself at the Dragon Quests and fight against other Masters in the PvP Arenas to collect exclusive dragons, claim Warrior’s Chests, and climb up the leaderboards!- Summon dragons of the at the Tree Of Life and try their skills.- Unlock advanced features like the Ancient World and the Guardian Dragons.- Be social: Join Alliances to play with other masters, chat with them, and open Alliance Chests.- Log in with Facebook to save your game and play on all your devices - That way you can take your baby dragons everywhere. There are over 80 million Dragon Masters. What are you waiting for? Join the fun!If you already love our dragons… Drop us a nice review :)Dragon City is FREE to download and FREE to play. However, you can purchase in-app items with real money. If you wish to disable this feature, please turn off the in-app purchases in your phone or tablet’s Settings.Follow us on Twitter: @DragonCityGameLike us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DragonCitySubscribe to our Youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/DragonCityChannelCheck out other cool games by the creators of Dragon City: Monster Legends and World Chef!
descriptionHTML:
Ready to take on the hottest role playing game out there and bend fire-breathing dragons to your will? Are you the one to claim the title of top Dragon Master in the world? Accept the challenge and prove your might!

Build a Dragon City on floating Islands and fill it with farms, habitats, buildings… and dragons! Collect and train your cute babies and evolve them into impressive beasts that will defend you in the PvP Arenas!

Join forces with other Dragon Masters in Alliances, interact in the chat and obtain rewards from the Alliance Chest.

Combine dragons of Fire, Nature, War, Legend and lots of other elements to hatch rare hybrids and expand your collection. You can also obtain dragons from exclusive events!

FEATURES

- Complete the Dragon Book! There are over 500 dragons to breed and collect.
- New dragons join the game every week through breeding events and special islands.
- Challenge yourself at the Dragon Quests and fight against other Masters in the PvP Arenas to collect exclusive dragons, claim Warrior’s Chests, and climb up the leaderboards!
- Summon dragons of the at the Tree Of Life and try their skills.
- Unlock advanced features like the Ancient World and the Guardian Dragons.
- Be social: Join Alliances to play with other masters, chat with them, and open Alliance Chests.
- Log in with Facebook to save your game and play on all your devices - That way you can take your baby dragons everywhere.

There are over 80 million Dragon Masters. What are you waiting for? Join the fun!

If you already love our dragons… Drop us a nice review :)

Dragon City is FREE to download and FREE to play. However, you can purchase in-app items with real money. If you wish to disable this feature, please turn off the in-app purchases in your phone or tablet’s Settings.

Follow us on Twitter: @DragonCityGame
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DragonCity
Subscribe to our Youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/DragonCityChannel

Check out other cool games by the creators of Dragon City: Monster Legends and World Chef!

Llacuna 166,
Planta 10
08018 Barcelona
Spain
recentChanges: Dragon City’s first social update: Play with other Dragon Masters!
- Join Alliances to chat and cooperate with other players!
- There’s a new element in the game: Primal! Come and discover their behavior in battle and be amazed by their look, a cool mix of dinosaurs, magic, and technology.

- Start opening Alliance Chests! By joining forces with the Dragons Masters in your Alliance to complete tasks, you'll be able to reach milestones and open Alliance Chests containing Primal Dragon Orbs!
summary: 💎Collect awesome dragons and become the ultimate Dragon Master! 🐲
title: Dragon City

comments: Seen to many players leave because of this. Players with over a billion in chips. Goes to a small table with players having 30k or 40k. Goes all in every hand and kills the table. Players ask him why he does it and not play bigger tables. His answer because game allows me to and I can knock out player after player. Regulate players if they have X amount of chips play on bigger tables. Let the smaller players gain chips and enjoy the game.

It appears that I have reached a certain point where my free play is being met with bot resistance. I've gained over ten million in one day and lost it all and more in suck outs. This game is super fun whilst the going is good, but I fear the algorithms are programmed to entice you to pay real money, which of course you'd have to be mental to do once you realise how loaded this game is. Play for free = fun

I will give a better review when I get the chips and rewards points I paid for. Its been 3 days now and no reply email to my problem with no chips/but I paid issue. And during this time I cannot play the tables I would have been able to do so. Hurry up!!!

Need to stop people from making it impossible to win buy betting so high you can't play because they Jack the bet so high.Not fair to those of us that are trying to play a fair game.They get all most all their chips by basically cheating to rest of us out of ours.           Need to have a section that explains how some of these games are played and the rules.

Pretty much agree with most if not all the nagative reviews. And thanks to a fellow reviewer am switching to zynga poker. The amount of ads is rediculous. Let me just so no to 6 different ads in a row as soon as i log in. Ill be sure to not contact your "concierge" and move on to something better. Maybe an app that actually appriciates feedback.

I really enjoy this game .At first I just added it for one of the games on app like to gain points for gift cards.And of course to learn how to play poker. Now if their no points given for this game I would still play it. I totally enjoy this game , and the people that play it. Its truly an enjoyable game. This game is a keeper know matter what.tthe only thing I wish is that their was more coins given .
